summary.span: 在网页上显示按钮控件。

span.span: Displays a push button control on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [按钮回发行为和服务器事件Button Postback Behavior and Server Events](#ButtonPostbackBehaviorandServerEvents) - [处理客户端脚本中的按钮事件Handling Button Events in Client Script](#HandlingButtonEventsinClientScript) - [按钮控件和验证Button Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [数据控件中的按钮Buttons in Data Controls](#ButtonsInDataControls) - [将数据绑定到控件Binding Data to the Controls](#BindingDataToTheControls) - [使用带有 UpdatePanel 控件的按钮Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls](#UsingButtonsWithUpdatePanelControls) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用 "" 控件在网页上创建一个 "推送" 按钮，该按钮使用户能够向服务器发送页面。Use the control to create a push button on the Web page that lets users to post a page to the server. 控件触发服务器代码中的一个事件，您可以处理该事件以响应回发。The control triggers an event in server code that you can handle to respond to the postback. 它还可以在客户端脚本中引发事件，您可以在页面发布之前处理此事件，或者运行然后取消页面的提交。It can also raise an event in client script that you can handle before the page is posted or that can run and then cancel submission of the page. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 包括几种按钮控件，每种按钮控件在网页上以不同方式显示。ASP.NET includes several kinds of button controls, each of which appears differently on Web pages. 它们是以 "按下" 按钮形式呈现的 控件;呈现为链接的 控件;和以图像形式呈现的 控件;和 控件，该控件使您可以创建具有用户可单击的热点的图形。They are the control, which renders as a push button; the control, which renders as a link; and the control, which renders as an image; and the control, which lets you create a graphic that has hotspots that users can click. 默认情况下，单击时，所有按钮控件都会提交该页。By default, all button controls submit the page when clicked. 你还可以使用 和 控件创建在服务器代码中可编程的页上的按钮。You can also use the and controls to create buttons on the page that are programmable in server code. 有关 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 服务器控件概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zsyt68f1(v=vs.100))。For details about the differences between HTML and Web server controls, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zsyt68f1(v=vs.100)). 默认情况下， 控件是 "提交" 按钮。By default, a control is a Submit button. "提交" 按钮没有与该按钮关联的命令名称（由 属性指定），只是将该网页发布回服务器。A Submit button does not have a command name (specified by the property) associated with the button and simply posts the Web page back to the server. 可以为 事件提供事件处理程序，以编程方式控制在单击 "提交" 按钮时执行的操作。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked. 命令按钮具有与按钮关联的命令名（例如 `Sort`），方法是设置 "" 属性。A Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`, by setting the property. 这样，便可以在网页上创建多个 控件，并以编程方式确定单击的 控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. 你还可以将 属性与命令按钮一起使用，以提供有关要执行的命令的其他信息，如 `Ascending`。You can also use the property with a command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as `Ascending`. 您可以为 事件提供事件处理程序，以编程方式控制单击命令按钮时执行的操作。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Command button is clicked. ## 按钮回发行为和服务器事件Button Postback Behavior and Server Events 当用户单击任何 Web 服务器控件按钮时，该页将发送到服务器。When a user clicks any Web server control button, the page is sent to the server. 这会导致在基于服务器的代码中处理网页并引发任何挂起事件。This causes the Web page to be processed and any pending events to be raised in server-based code. 完成所有页面和控件处理后，页面会再次呈现给浏览器。When all page and control processing has finished, the page renders itself to the browser again. 按钮可以引发自己的 事件或 事件，可以使用基于服务器的代码处理这些事件。The buttons can raise their own events or event, which you can handle by using server-based code. 这不同于传统 HTML 页或基于客户端的 Web 应用程序中的事件，其中按钮 `onclick` 事件通过使用在客户端中运行的 JavaScript 来处理。This is different than events in traditional HTML pages or in client-based Web applications, where a button's `onclick` event is handled by using JavaScript that runs in the client. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体服务器控件事件模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/y3bwdsh3(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/y3bwdsh3(v=vs.100)). 用户单击按钮控件时，该页会回发到服务器。When users click a button control, the page is posted back to the server. 默认情况下，该页面会回发到自身。By default, the page is posted back to itself, 您可以将按钮配置为将当前页发送到另一页。You can configure buttons to post the current page to another page. 这对于创建多页窗体非常有用。This can be useful for creating multi-page forms. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web Forms 中的跨页面发布](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178139(v=vs.100))。For details, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178139(v=vs.100)). ## 处理客户端脚本中的按钮事件Handling Button Events in Client Script 按钮控件可以引发服务器事件和客户端事件。Button controls can raise both server events and client events. 在回发后发生服务器事件，并在为该页编写的服务器端代码中处理这些事件。Server events occur after postback, and they are handled in the server-side code that you write for the page. 客户端事件在客户端脚本（通常是 ECMAScript （JavaScript））中处理，在提交页面之前引发。Client events are handled in client script, typically ECMAScript (JavaScript), and are raised before the page is submitted. 通过向 ASP.NET 按钮控件添加客户端事件，可以在提交页面之前执行一些任务，如显示确认对话框，并可能取消提交。By adding client-side events to ASP.NET button controls, you can perform tasks such as displaying confirmation dialog boxes before submitting the page, and potentially cancel the submission. 有关详细信息，请参阅[中的客户端脚本 ASP.NET 网页](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3hc29e2a(v=vs.100))和[如何：在客户端脚本中响应按钮 Web 服务器控件事件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms227426(v=vs.100))。For details, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3hc29e2a(v=vs.100)) and [How to: Respond to Button Web Server Control Events in Client Script](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms227426(v=vs.100)). 你可能还希望 控件也使用客户端脚本来执行回发（而不是简单地执行 HTTP POST 操作）。You might also want the control to also use client script to perform the postback (instead of simply performing an HTTP POST operation). 如果要以编程方式处理回发（如将其附加到页面上的其他元素），这会很有用。This can be useful if you want to programmatically manipulate the postback, such as attaching it to other elements on the page. 可以将 控件的 属性设置为 `true`，使 控件使用基于客户端脚本的回发。You can set the control's property to `true` to cause the control to use client-script based postback. ## 按钮控件和验证Button Controls and Validation 如果页面包含 ASP.NET 验证程序控件，则默认情况下，单击按钮控件将导致验证程序控件执行其检查。If a page contains ASP.NET validator controls, by default, clicking a button control causes the validator control to perform its check. 如果为验证程序控件启用了客户端验证，则在验证检查失败的情况下不会提交该页。If client-side validation is enabled for a validator control, the page is not submitted if a validation check has failed. 下表描述了按钮控件支持的属性，这些属性使你能够更精确地控制验证过程。The following table describes the properties supported by button controls that enable you to control the validation process more precisely. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定单击按钮是否还会执行验证检查。Specifies whether clicking the button also performs a validation check. 将此属性设置为 "`false`" 以防止验证检查。Set this property to `false` to prevent a validation check.| ||使您能够指定在单击按钮时要调用的页上的验证程序。Enables you to specify which validators on the page are called when the button is clicked. 如果未建立验证组，按钮单击将调用该页上的所有验证程序。If no validation groups are established, a button click calls all of the validators that are on the page.| 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). ## 数据控件中的按钮Buttons in Data Controls 按钮 Web 服务器控件通常用于数据控件，如 、和 列表控件中。Button Web server controls are often used in data controls, such as in the , , and list controls. 在这些情况下，通常不会直接响应按钮单击事件。In those cases, you typically do not respond directly to the button click event. 相反，数据控件中的按钮引发特定于数据控件的事件。Instead, a button in a data control raises an event that is specific to the data control. 例如，在 控件中，按钮可能引发 控件的 事件，而不是引发 控件的 事件。For example, in the control, a button might raise the control's event instead of raising the control's event. 由于数据绑定列表控件可以包含多个按钮，因此您可以设置按钮的 属性以指定作为事件的一部分传递的值。Because data-bound list controls can contain many buttons, you can set the button's property to specify a value to pass as part of the event. 然后，你可以测试此参数以查看单击了哪个按钮。You can then test for this argument to see which button was clicked. ## 将数据绑定到控件Binding Data to the Controls 您可以将按钮 Web 服务器控件绑定到数据源，以便动态控制其属性设置。You can bind the button Web server controls to a data source in order to control their property settings dynamically. 例如，可以使用数据绑定来设置按钮的 属性。For example, you can set a button's property by using data binding. ## 使用带有 UpdatePanel 控件的按钮Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls 通过部分页呈现，可以在不回发的情况下刷新部分页面。Partial-page rendering makes it possible to refresh portions of a page without a postback. 控件使您能够标记部分页面呈现的部分页面。 controls enable you to mark parts of the page that participate in partial-page rendering. 默认情况下， 控件内的控件的行为（包括 控件）是执行异步回发而不是回发。By default, the behavior of controls inside an control, including controls, is to perform an asynchronous postback instead of a postback. 这仅刷新回发源自的 控件的内容。This refreshes only the contents of the control from which the postback originates. 除了 控件内 控件的方案外，还可以在以下方案中将 控件与 控件一起使用：In addition to the scenario of a control that is inside an control, you can use controls with controls in the following scenarios: - 将 控件之外的 控件定义为该面板的 控件。Defining a control that is outside an control as an control for that panel. 单击该按钮时，它会执行异步回发并刷新面板的内容。When the button is clicked, it performs an asynchronous postback and refreshes the contents of the panel. - 将 控件内的 控件定义为面板的 。Defining a control that is inside an control as a for the panel. 单击该按钮时，它会执行回发，即使它位于 控件中。When the button is clicked, it performs a postback even though it is inside an control. 有关部分页面呈现和使用 控件的详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100))和[部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information about partial-page rendering and using controls, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100)) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个提交 控件，以将网页内容回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to create a Submit control that posts the Web page content back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Button Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Button Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个对列表进行排序 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a Command control that sorts a list. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

[!code-aspx-csharp[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/CS/custombuttonaddattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/VB/custombuttonaddattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/CS/custombuttonaddattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/VB/custombuttonaddattributestorender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，单击 控件时，将执行页验证。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 使用 属性单击 控件时，可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is clicked by using the property. 若要防止执行验证，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 使用 属性回发到其他页面时，应将 属性设置为 `false`。You should set the property to `false` when you are using the property to post back to a different page. 向其他页面回发时，应显式检查验证。You should explicitly check validation when posting back to a different page. 有关示例，请参见 属性的 "备注" 部分。For an example, see the Remarks section of the property. 此属性通常设置为 "`false`" `reset` "或" `clear` "按钮，以防止在单击按钮时执行验证。This property is commonly set to `false` for a `reset` or `clear` button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 当 属性的值设置为 `true`时，还可以使用 属性来指定 控件对其进行验证的验证组的名称。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性阻止页验证发生。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意， 方法独立激活每个验证控件。Note that the method activates each validation control independently. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonControlCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonControlCausesValidation/CS/buttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonControlCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonControlCausesValidation/VB/buttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

member this.Click : EventHandler

summary.span: 在单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 当没有与 控件关联的命令名（例如，使用 "提交" 按钮）时，通常会使用此事件。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control (for instance, with a Submit button). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写 事件的事件处理程序，以便在单击 控件时在网页上显示一条消息。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event in order to display a message on the Web page when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Button Web Server Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command;
.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command
Public Custom Event Command As CommandEventHandler
public: event System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventHandler ^ Command;
member this.Command : System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler
public: virtual event System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventHandler ^ Command;

summary.span: 在单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 当命令名称（如 `Sort`）与 控件相关联时，通常使用此事件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 这样，便可以在网页上创建多个 控件，并以编程方式确定单击的 控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 事件通过控件层次结构以 `BubbleEvent`的形式引发。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写 事件的事件处理程序，以便在单击 控件时对列表进行排序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event to sort a list when the control is clicked. 此示例使用 控件的 属性以声明方式指定事件处理程序。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何指定事件处理程序，并以编程方式将其添加到 `Page_Load` 方法中的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Button Web Server Controls

.property instance string CommandArgument
Public Property CommandArgument As String

member this.CommandArgument : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可选参数，该参数与关联的 一起被传递到 事件。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional parameter passed to the event along with the associated .

value.span: 与关联的 一起被传递到 事件的可选参数。

span.span: An optional parameter passed to the event along with the associated .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定补充 属性的参数。Use the property to specify a parameter that compliments the property. > [!NOTE] > 虽然你可以自行设置 属性，但通常仅在同时设置了 属性时使用。Although you can set the property by itself, it is normally only used when the property is also set. 通过允许提供有关要执行的命令的附加信息， 属性可对 属性进行补充。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide additional information about the command to perform. 例如，如果将 属性设置为 `Sort` 并将 属性设置为 `Ascending`，则可以指定要按升序排序的命令。For example, if you set the property to `Sort` and the property to `Ascending`, you specify a command to sort in ascending order. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性创建一个按升序对列表进行排序的 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a control that sorts a list in ascending order. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件

Public Property CommandName As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CommandName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置命令名，该命令名与传递给 事件的 控件相关联。

span.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control that is passed to the event.
The command name of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果网页上有多个 控件，请使用 属性来指定或确定与每个 控件关联的命令名。When you have multiple controls on a Web page, use the property to specify or determine the command name associated with each control. 可以将 属性设置为任何标识要执行的命令的字符串。You can set the property with any string that identifies the command to perform. 然后，你可以通过编程方式确定 控件的命令名称并执行适当的操作。You can then programmatically determine the command name of the control and perform the appropriate actions. 可以通过使用 属性指定有关命令的其他信息，如 `Ascending`。Additional information about the command, such as `Ascending`, may be specified by using the property. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性创建对列表进行排序的 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a control that sorts a list. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 创建表示 控件的回发行为的 对象。

span.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

returns.span: 一个表示 控件的回发行为的 。

span.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个表示 控件的回发行为的 对象。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 然后， 对象通常会传递到 方法，该方法用于获取对客户端脚本函数的引用，在调用该函数时，会导致服务器回发到页面。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page. 此方法主要由控件开发人员在扩展 类时使用。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 可以在派生类中重写 方法，以修改按钮控件的回发选项，或在单击按钮时调用客户端脚本。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 请确保调用基类的 方法，以便设置标准回发选项。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Button Web Server Controls

related.span: ASP.NET 网页中的客户端脚本

span.span: Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnClick (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnClick (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnClick(EventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnClick : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnClick : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 当没有与 控件关联的命令名（例如，使用 "提交" 按钮）时，通常会使用此事件。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control (for instance, with a Submit button). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写事件处理程序，以便在网页上显示简单消息。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event in order to display a simple message on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件

summary.span: 获取或设置在引发某个 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

span.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

value.span: 在引发某个 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

span.span: The client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定在引发 控件的 事件时执行的其他客户端脚本。Use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised. 为此属性指定的脚本将呈现在 控件的 `OnClick` 属性中，以及控件的预定义客户端脚本。The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192871)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192871). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定在单击 控件时执行的其他客户端脚本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.OnClientClick/cs/button.onclientclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.OnClientClick/vb/button.onclientclickvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 当命令名称（如 `Sort`）与 控件相关联时，通常使用此事件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 这样，便可以在网页上创建多个 控件，并以编程方式确定单击的 控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 事件通过控件层次结构以 `BubbleEvent`的形式引发。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写 事件的事件处理程序，以便在单击 控件时对列表进行排序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event to sort a list when the control is clicked. 此示例使用 控件的 属性以声明方式指定事件处理程序。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何指定事件处理程序，并以编程方式将其添加到 `Page_Load` 方法中的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 确定按钮在客户端上呈现之前是否已被单击。

span.span: Determines whether the button has been clicked prior to rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从 控件派生自定义类时， 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string PostBackUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string PostBackUrl
Public Overridable Property PostBackUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ PostBackUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PostBackUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示将页回发到自身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您使用 控件执行跨页面发布。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. > [!NOTE] > 只有正确指定的路径才能使用此属性。Only correctly specified paths work with this property. 例如，相对路径（`Test/default.aspx`）、绝对路径（`https://localhost/WebApp/default.aspx`）和虚拟（`~\Test\default.aspx`）都能正常工作。For example, relative paths (`Test/default.aspx`), absolute paths (`https://localhost/WebApp/default.aspx`) and virtual (`~\Test\default.aspx`) work correctly. 格式不正确的路径（例如 "/Test/default.aspx" 或 "\Test\default.aspx"）不起作用。Incorrectly formed paths such as "/Test/default.aspx" or "\Test\default.aspx" do not work. 有关创建正确路径的讨论，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目路径](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178116(v=vs.100))。See [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178116(v=vs.100)) for a discussion on creating correct paths. 当单击 控件时，将 属性设置为要发布到的网页的 URL。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定 `Page2.aspx` 会导致包含 控件的页面发布到 `Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果没有为 属性指定值，则页面回发到自身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用带有服务器端验证的控件执行跨页面回发时，在处理回发之前，应检查是否 `true` 该页的 属性。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 对于跨页面回发，要检查的页面是 。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the . 以下 VB 代码演示了如何执行此操作：The following VB code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 有关跨页面发布技术的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web Forms 中的跨页面发布](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178139(v=vs.100))。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178139(v=vs.100)). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来执行跨页面的 post。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 当用户单击 控件时，此页将在文本框中输入的值发送到 属性指定的目标页。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要运行此示例，还必须在与此代码示例相同的目录中为目标页创建一个文件。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 目标页的代码在下一个示例中提供。The code for target page is provided in the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/button.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/button.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问使用 属性从另一页发送的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此页获取从上一页发送的字符串，并将其显示给用户。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果尝试直接运行此代码示例，将会出现错误，因为 "`text`" 字段的值将 `null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `text` field will be `null`. 相反，请使用此代码创建一个目标页，并将该文件放在与上一个示例的代码相同的目录中。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 该文件的名称必须与上一示例中为 属性指定的值相对应。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 运行上一示例中的代码时，此页将在出现跨页面 post 时自动执行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross page post occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/button.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/button.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 网页中的跨页面发送

span.span: Cross-Page Posting in an ASP.NET Web Page

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Button Web Server Controls

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RaisePostBackEvent (string eventArgument);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String)
protected: virtual void RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument);
abstract member RaisePostBackEvent : string -> unit override this.RaisePostBackEvent : string -> unit

span.span: The argument for the event.

summary.span: 当 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件中显示的文本标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption displayed in the control.

value.span: 在 控件中显示的文本标题。

span.span: The text caption displayed in the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定或确定要在 控件中显示的标题。Use the property to specify or determine the caption to display in the control. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定在 控件中显示的标题。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool UseSubmitBehavior { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseSubmitBehavior
Public Overridable Property UseSubmitBehavior As Boolean
public: virtual property bool UseSubmitBehavior { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseSubmitBehavior : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示 控件使用客户端浏览器的提交机制还是 ASP.NET 回发机制。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism.

value.span: 如果该控件使用了客户端浏览器的提交机制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定 控件是使用客户端浏览器的提交机制还是 ASP.NET 回发机制。Use the property to specify whether a control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism. 默认情况下，此属性的值为 `true`，导致 控件使用浏览器的提交机制。By default the value of this property is `true`, causing the control to use the browser's submit mechanism. 如果指定 `false`，ASP.NET 页框架会将客户端脚本添加到页面，以将窗体发布到服务器。If you specify `false`, the ASP.NET page framework adds client-side script to the page to post the form to the server. 当 `false` 属性时，控件开发人员可以使用 方法返回 的客户端回发事件。When the property is `false`, control developers can use the method to return the client postback event for the . 方法返回的字符串包含客户端函数调用的文本，并且可以插入到客户端事件处理程序中。The string returned by the method contains the text of the client-side function call and can be inserted into a client-side event handler. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定 控件回发到服务器时所使用的提交机制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the submit mechanism that a control uses when it posts back to the server. 属性设置为 `false`，导致按钮使用 ASP.NET 回发机制。The property is set to `false`, causing the button to use the ASP.NET postback mechanism. 如果你使用浏览器的 "查看源" 命令查看呈现的页面的源代码，你将看到 ASP.NET 页框架添加了客户端脚本，以便将窗体发布到服务器。If you view the source code for the rendered page using your browser's View Source command, you will see that client-side script has been added by the ASP.NET page framework to post the form to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.UseSubmitBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.UseSubmitBehavior/CS/button.usesubmitbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.UseSubmitBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.UseSubmitBehavior/VB/button.usesubmitbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性可指定 控件回发到服务器时所导致验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当 属性的值设置为 `true`时，此属性才有效。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为 属性指定值，则当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值，并且 属性设置为 `true`，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定 控件回发到服务器时要验证的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when a control posts back to the server. 此页包含三个文本框，用于捕获用户的数据和三个 控件，以确保用户不会将文本框留空。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 前两个文本框的 控件位于 `PersonalInfoGroup` 验证组中，第三个文本框的 控件位于 `LocationInfoGroup` 验证组中。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 单击 `Button1` 时，只会验证验证组 `PersonalInfoGroup` 中的控件。When `Button1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 单击 `Button2` 后，只验证验证组 `LocationInfoGroup` 中的控件。When `Button2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.ValidationGroup/CS/button.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.ValidationGroup/VB/button.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
